message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40.
Counter-offer: 58-42 split. Don't let inflation eat away your share!
Okay, how about a 52/48 split? This is a good deal considering the inflation.
Inflation is taking its toll on your share, 57-43 is a fair deal now.
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at my share further.
You're right, time is of the essence. But I think 56-44 is more suitable considering the circumstances.
